Room.Name: Ancient Bibliotheke
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered a large, ancient library filled with books.
Room.LongDescription: The Great Bibliotheke (rumored to be only a mere myth) houses the most powerful spells in creation. It is the storehouse for all of Kelsar's ancient mages and was thought to have been destroyed centuries ago. There are bookshelves upon bookshelves of ancient books along the walls. It's a mage's paradise.
